name: Steelfire Commandos
description:
Controls

Arrows/WASD - Move and Aim
Z/Num  1 - Fire
X/Num 2 - Special 1
C/Num 3 - Special 2
R/Num 0 - Reload
Space - Jump

Hold Down + Jump to fall through platforms.

Made in a Week for Games Made Quick Jam

Based on a prototype I made about a year ago, expanded out into a small game.

The plan was to have a small boss fight before each control room, but I ran out of time.  Did get one boss in. I might come back to it later and add more in. Definitely want to expand on the setting at least.
